title: Spot Real Estate

<map name="1940345" theme="prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Spot Real Estate" id="1"><topic position="1189,-118" order="0" id="2"><text><![CDATA[• Address: 860 Warwick Lane Lake Zurich Illinois 60047 USA
• Phone: 847-780-7768
• Website: https://spot.realty
• Email: info@spot.realty

For years, home sellers have been trapped in a false choice:
Pay 3-4.5% to a traditional agent-- giving up thousands in payments.
Or go flat charge and handle whatever yourself-- while getting little to no support.

But there's another means.

SPOT delivers the full-service experience of traditional brokerages-- without the bloated costs.

Unlike big-box real estate firms, we do not waste money on unneeded office space, too much staff, or flashy marketing that does not offer homes.

Instead, we operate with a structured, distributed workforce-- cutting waste and passing those savings directly to you.

Imagine obtaining complete MLS direct exposure, specialist arrangement, and real marketing-- without paying a fortune in fees. Imagine dealing with skilled professionals who deal with every detail for you, instead of chasing down documents, managing representatives who hardly know your property, or getting stuck in an outdated, ineffective process.

This isn't regarding cutting corners.
It's about cutting waste.
]]></text></topic></topic></map>
